starts-with.expression: \b(let|var|const)\s+((?:\b[a-zA-Z_]|\$)[A-Za-zÀ-ÖØ-öø-ÿŸřŘšŠžŽ0-9_]*)\s*(=)\s* # Variable (?:(async)\s+)?(?=(?: (?<![A-Za-zÀ-ÖØ-öø-ÿŸřŘšŠžŽ0-9_]) # Not preceeded by an identifier (?:\( (?: # Opening parenthesis preceeded by an identifier (function call) ((?<=[A-Za-zÀ-ÖØ-öø-ÿŸřŘšŠžŽ0-9_])\() # Closing parenthesis not followed by the arrow operator | (\)(?!\s*=>)) # All characters other than parenthesis | [^\(\)] )* \)) # (arg, arg) => |(?:(?:\b[a-zA-Z_]|\$)[A-Za-zÀ-ÖØ-öø-ÿŸřŘšŠžŽ0-9_]*) # arg => )\s*=>\s*)
